name: Burn
description: Deals damage over time and reduces attack power.

name: Freeze
description: Prevents the target from taking any actions for a short duration.

name: Paralyze
description: Reduces the target's speed and prevents them from doing actions.

name: Sleep
description: Puts the target to sleep, preventing actions until they wake up.

name: Bleed
description: Causes the target to lose health over time due to bleeding.

name: Confuse
description: Causes the target to act unpredictably, causing it to attack itself randomly.

name: Hasted
description: Increases speed for a set amount of rounds/turns.

name: Slowed
description: Decreases speed for a set amount of rounds/turns.

name: Rooted
description: Cannot dodge attacks for several turns.

name: Blinked
description: Has a higher chance to teleport out of the way of incoming attacks (gives a big boost to dodge) for several turns.

name: Enraged
description: Increases attack damage, but forces Critter to only use the basic Attack (no special moves).

name: Silenced
description: Prevents use of special moves for a number of turns.

name: Shocked
description: Instantly deals electrical damage and may randomly interrupt actions per turn.

name: Drained
description: Reduces energy each turn for its duration (several turns).
